Package RateLimiter

Class ApiIndex

java.lang.Object
RateLimiter.ApiIndex
public final class ApiIndex
extends java.lang.Object
This singleton class is used for storing information about which Api's the rate limit is applied and their default limit.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private long defaultLimit
    When an Api is added without mentioning its default limit, this limit is added implicitly.
    private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> indexMap
    Here we store the Api ID and its default limit.
    static ApiIndex instance
    Only a single object is created and all methods are accessed from this object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private ApiIndex()
    Constructor is marked as private for preventing the creation of multiple objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Add's an Api to the index.
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit)
    Add's an Api to the index.
    boolean contains​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Used for checking if an Api is present or not.
    long getDefaultLimit()
    Returns the default limit which is generally assigned to Api's.
    long getDefaultLimit​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Returns the default limit for a specific Api.
    void setDefaultLimit​(long limit)
    Used for changing the default limit which is applied to general Api's.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • instance

      public static final ApiIndex instance
      Only a single object is created and all methods are accessed from this object.

    • defaultLimit

      private long defaultLimit
      When an Api is added without mentioning its default limit, this limit is added implicitly.

    • indexMap

      private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> indexMap
      Here we store the Api ID and its default limit.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApiIndex

      private ApiIndex()
      Constructor is marked as private for preventing the creation of multiple objects.

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Used for checking if an Api is present or not. If not present, then it is assumed that no rate limiting is applied to that Api.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      Returns:
      true if the api is present, false otherwise.

    • getDefaultLimit

      public long getDefaultLimit​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Returns the default limit for a specific Api.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.

    • getDefaultLimit

      public long getDefaultLimit()
      Returns the default limit which is generally assigned to Api's.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Add's an Api to the index. Since the limit is not mentioned default limit is applied.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit)
      Add's an Api to the index. Since the limit is mentioned , the Api will be added with this value.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      specificLimit - Limit for this specific Api.

    • setDefaultLimit

      public void setDefaultLimit​(long limit)
      Used for changing the default limit which is applied to general Api's.
      Parameters:
      limit -
